card.name: [OP] DON!! [CORE-001]
card.text: Your Turn +1000

card.name: [OP] Buggy [OP03-008]
card.text: This Character cannot be K.O.'d in battle by attribute cards. [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 red Event and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: [OP] Charlotte Linlin [OP03-114]
card.text: [On Play] If your Leader has the {Big Mom Pirates} type, add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your Life cards. Then, trash up to 1 card from the top of your opponent's Life cards.

card.name: [OP] Sugar [OP04-024]
card.text: [Opponent's Turn] [Once Per Turn] When your opponent plays a Character, if your Leader has the {Donquixote Pirates} type, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters. Then, rest this Character. [On Play] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

card.name: [OP] Ms. All Sunday [OP04-064]
card.text: [On Play] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it. Then, if you have 6 or more DON!! cards on your field, draw 1 card. [Trigger] DON!! −2 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Play this card.

card.name: [OP] Borsalino [OP05-051]
card.text: [On Play] Place up to 1 Character with a cost of 4 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

card.name: [OP] Rebecca [OP05-091]
card.text: [Blocker] [On Play] Add up to 1 black Character card with a cost of 3 to 7 other than [Rebecca] from your trash to your hand. Then, play up to 1 black Character card with a cost of 3 or less from your hand rested.

card.name: [OP] Uta [OP06-001]
card.text: [When Attacking] You may trash 1 {FILM} type card from your hand: Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2000 power during this turn. Then, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.

card.name: [OP] Inazuma [OP06-002]
card.text: If this Character has 7000 power or more, this Character gains [Banish]. (When this card deals damage, the target card is trashed without activating its Trigger.)

card.name: [OP] Emporio.Ivankov [OP06-003]
card.text: [On Play] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck and play up to 1 {Revolutionary Army} type Character card with 5000 power or less. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: [OP] Baron Omatsuri [OP06-004]
card.text: [On Play] Play up to 1 [Lily Carnation] from your hand.

card.name: [OP] Saga [OP06-006]
card.text: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] This Character gains +1000 power until the start of your next turn. Then, trash 1 of your {FILM} type Characters at the end of this turn.

card.name: [OP] Shanks [OP06-007]
card.text: [On Play] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 10000 power or less.

card.name: [OP] Shuraiya [OP06-009]
card.text: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.) [When Attacking]/[On Block] [Once Per Turn] This Character's base power becomes the same as your opponent's Leader until the start of your next turn.

card.name: [OP] Douglas Bullet [OP06-010]
card.text: If your Leader has the {FILM} type, this Character gains [Blocker]. (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

card.name: [OP] Tot Musica [OP06-011]
card.text: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may rest 1 of your [Uta] cards: This Character gains +5000 power during this turn.

card.name: [OP] Bear.King [OP06-012]
card.text: If your opponent has a Leader or Character with a base power of 6000 or more, this Character cannot be K.O.'d in battle.

card.name: [OP] Monkey.D.Luffy [OP06-013]
card.text: [On Play] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {FILM} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. [Trigger] Activate this card's [On Play] effect.

card.name: [OP] Ratchet [OP06-014]
card.text: [On Your Opponent's Attack] You may trash any number of {FILM} type cards from your hand. Your Leader or 1 of your Characters gains +1000 power during this battle for every card trashed.

card.name: [OP] Lily Carnation [OP06-015]
card.text: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may trash 1 of your Characters with 6000 power or more: Play up to 1 {FILM} type Character card with 2000 to 5000 power from your trash rested.

card.name: [OP] Raise Max [OP06-016]
card.text: [Activate: Main] You may place this Character at the bottom of the owner's deck: Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −3000 power during this turn.

card.name: [OP] Meteor-Strike of Love [OP06-017]
card.text: [Main]/[Counter] You may add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this turn.

card.name: [OP] Gum-Gum King Kong Gatling [OP06-018]
card.text: [Main] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this turn. Then, if your opponent has a Character with 7000 power or more, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn. [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 5000 power or less.

card.name: [OP] Blue Dragon Seal Water Stream [OP06-019]
card.text: [Main] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 5000 power or less. [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 4000 power or less.

card.name: [OP] Hody Jones [OP06-020]
card.text: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Leader: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's DON!! cards or Characters with a cost of 3 or less. Then, you cannot add Life cards to your hand using your own effects during this turn.

card.name: [OP] Perona [OP06-021]
card.text: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] Choose one: • Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less. • Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −1 cost during this turn.

card.name: [OP] Yamato [OP06-022]
card.text: [Double Attack] (This card deals 2 damage.) [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] If your opponent has 3 or less Life cards, give up to 2 rested DON!! cards to 1 of your Characters.

card.name: [OP] Arlong [OP06-023]
card.text: [On Play] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Up to 1 of your opponent's rested Leader cannot attack until the end of your opponent's next turn. [Trigger] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

card.name: [OP] Ikaros Much [OP06-024]
card.text: [On Play] If your Leader has the {New Fish-Man Pirates} type, play up to 1 {Fish-Man} type Character card with a cost of 4 or less from your hand. Then, add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.

card.name: [OP] Camie [OP06-025]
card.text: [On Play] Look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type card other than [Camie] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: [OP] Koushirou [OP06-026]
card.text: [On Play] Set up to 1 of your attribute Characters with a cost of 4 or less as active. Then, you cannot attack a Leader during this turn.

card.name: [OP] Gyro [OP06-027]
card.text: [On K.O.] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

card.name: [OP] Zeo [OP06-028]
card.text: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] If your Leader has the {New Fish-Man Pirates} type, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active and this Character gains +1000 power during this turn. Then, add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.

card.name: [OP] Daruma [OP06-029]
card.text: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If your Leader has the {New Fish-Man Pirates} type, set this Character as active and this Character gains +1000 power during this turn. Then, add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.

card.name: [OP] Dosun [OP06-030]
card.text: [When Attacking] If your Leader has the {New Fish-Man Pirates} type, this Character cannot be K.O.'d in battle and gains +2000 power until the start of your next turn. Then, add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.

card.name: [OP] Hatchan [OP06-031]
card.text: [Trigger] Play up to 1 {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type Character card with a cost of 3 or less from your hand.

card.name: [OP] Hammond [OP06-032]
card.text: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

card.name: [OP] Vander Decken IX [OP06-033]
card.text: [On Play] You may trash 1 {Fish-Man} type card from your hand or 1 [The Ark Noah] from your hand or field: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters.

card.name: [OP] Hyouzou [OP06-034]
card.text: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less and this Character gains +1000 power during this turn. Then, add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.

card.name: [OP] Hody Jones [OP06-035]
card.text: [Rush] (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.) [On Play] Rest up to a total of 2 of your opponent's Characters or DON!! cards. Then, add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.

card.name: [OP] Ryuma [OP06-036]
card.text: [On Play]/[On K.O.] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

card.name: [OP] The Billion-fold World Trichiliocosm [OP06-038]
card.text: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, if you have 8 or more rested cards, that card gains an additional +2000 power during this battle. [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

card.name: [OP] You Ain't Even Worth Killing Time!! [OP06-039]
card.text: [Main] Choose one: • Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or less. • K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 6 or less. [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

card.name: [OP] Shark Arrows [OP06-040]
card.text: [Main] K.O. up to 2 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less. [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

card.name: [OP] The Ark Noah [OP06-041]
card.text: [On Play] Rest all of your opponent's Characters. [Trigger] Play this card.

card.name: [OP] Vinsmoke Reiju [OP06-042]
card.text: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When a DON!! card on your field is returned to your DON!! deck, draw 1 card.

card.name: [OP] Aramaki [OP06-043]
card.text: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.) [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may trash 1 card from your hand and place 1 Character with a cost of 2 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck: This Character gains +3000 power during this turn.

card.name: [OP] Gion [OP06-044]
card.text: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When your opponent activates an Event, your opponent must place 1 card from their hand at the bottom of their deck.

card.name: [OP] Kuzan [OP06-045]
card.text: [On Play] Draw 2 cards and place 2 cards from your hand at the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: [OP] Sakazuki [OP06-046]
card.text: [On Play] Place up to 1 Character with a cost of 2 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

card.name: [OP] Charlotte Pudding [OP06-047]
card.text: [On Play] Your opponent returns all cards in their hand to their deck and shuffles their deck. Then, your opponent draws 5 cards.

card.name: [OP] Zeff [OP06-048]
card.text: [Your Turn] When your opponent activates [Blocker] or an Event, if your Leader has the {East Blue} type, you may trash 4 cards from the top of your deck.

card.name: [OP] Tashigi [OP06-050]
card.text: [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Navy} type card other than [Tashigi] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: [OP] Tsuru [OP06-051]
card.text: [On Play] You may trash 2 cards from your hand: Your opponent returns 1 of their Characters to the owner's hand.

card.name: [OP] Tokikake [OP06-052]
card.text: [DON!! x1] If you have 4 or less cards in your hand, this Character cannot be K.O.'d in battle.

card.name: [OP] Jaguar.D.Saul [OP06-053]
card.text: [On K.O.] Place up to 1 Character with a cost of 2 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

card.name: [OP] Borsalino [OP06-054]
card.text: If you have 5 or less cards in your hand, this Character gains [Blocker]. (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

card.name: [OP] Monkey.D.Garp [OP06-055]
card.text: [DON!! x2] [When Attacking] If you have 4 or less cards in your hand, your opponent cannot activate [Blocker] during this battle.

card.name: [OP] Ama no Murakumo Sword [OP06-056]
card.text: [Main] Place up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less and up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 1 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck in any order. [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

card.name: [OP] But I Will Never Doubt a Woman's Tears!!!! [OP06-057]
card.text: [Main] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn. Then, reveal 1 card from the top of your deck, play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 2, and place the rest at the top or bottom of your deck. [Trigger] Play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 2 from your hand.

card.name: [OP] Gravity Blade Raging Tiger [OP06-058]
card.text: [Main] Place up to 2 Characters with a cost of 6 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck in any order. [Trigger] Place up to 1 Character with a cost of 5 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

card.name: [OP] White Snake [OP06-059]
card.text: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn, and draw 1 card. [Trigger] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck and place them at the top or bottom of your deck in any order.

card.text: [Activate: Main] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.) You may trash this Character: If your Leader has the {GERMA 66} type, play up to 1 [Vinsmoke Ichiji] with a cost of 7 from your hand or trash.

card.text: [On Play] If the number of DON!! cards on your field is equal to or less than the number on your opponent's field, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2000 power during this turn and this Character gains [Rush]. (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)

card.text: [On Play] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.) You may trash 2 cards from your hand: Play up to 4 {GERMA 66} type Character cards with different card names and 4000 power or less from your trash. [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] DON!! −1: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's DON!! cards.

card.text: [On Play] You may trash 1 card from your hand: If the number of DON!! cards on your field is equal to or less than the number on your opponent's field, add up to 1 {The Vinsmoke Family} type Character card with 4000 power or less from your trash to your hand.

card.name: [OP] Vinsmoke Niji [OP06-064]
card.text: [Activate: Main] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.) You may trash this Character: If your Leader has the {GERMA 66} type, play up to 1 [Vinsmoke Niji] with a cost of 5 from your hand or trash.

card.text: [On Play] If the number of DON!! cards on your field is equal to or less than the number on your opponent's field, choose one: • K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less. • Return up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less to the owner's hand.

card.name: [OP] Vinsmoke Yonji [OP06-066]
card.text: [Activate: Main] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.) You may trash this Character: If your Leader has the {GERMA 66} type, play up to 1 [Vinsmoke Yonji] with a cost of 4 from your hand or trash.

card.text: If the number of DON!! cards on your field is equal to or less than the number on your opponent's field, this Character gains +1000 power. [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

card.text: [Activate: Main] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.) You may trash this Character: If your Leader has the {GERMA 66} type, play up to 1 [Vinsmoke Reiju] with a cost of 4 from your hand or trash.

card.text: [On Play] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): If your Leader has the {FILM} type, add up to 2 {FILM} type Character cards with a cost of 4 or less from your trash to your hand.

card.name: [OP] Cosette [OP06-072]
card.text: If your Leader has the {GERMA 66} type and the number of DON!! cards on your field is at least 2 less than the number on your opponent's field, this Character gains [Blocker]. (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

card.name: [OP] Shiki [OP06-073]
card.text: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.) [On Play] If you have 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, draw 1 card and trash 1 card from your hand.

card.text: [On Play] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Negate the effect of up to 1 of your opponent's Characters during this turn. Then, if that Character has 5000 power or less, K.O. it.

card.name: [OP] Count Battler [OP06-075]
card.text: [On Play] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Rest up to 2 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less.

card.text: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When a DON!! card on your field is returned to your DON!! deck, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less.

card.text: [Main] If the number of DON!! cards on your field is equal to or less than the number on your opponent's field, place up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.
